sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const StockLedger = () => { const [stockItems, setStockItems] = useState([]); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [showMasterMenu, setShowMasterMenu] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ product: '', unitCost: '', unit: '', totalValue: '', onHand: '', freeToUse: '', incoming: '', outgoing: '' }); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { // Load mock stock data setStockItems([ { id: 1, product: 'Dining Table', unitCost: '1200 Rs', unit: 'Unit', totalValue: '600000', onHand: '500', freeToUse: '270', incoming: '0', outgoing: '230' }, { id: 2, product: 'Drawer', unitCost: '100 Rs', unit: 'Unit', totalValue: '2000', onHand: '20', freeToUse: '20', incoming: '0', outgoing: '0' } ]); }, []); const handleSearch = (e) => { setSearchTerm(e.target.value); }; const filteredStockItems = (stockItems || []).filter(item => item.product?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const handleSave = () => { // Calculate total value based on unit cost and on hand const calculatedTotalValue = parseFloat(formData.unitCost.replace(/[^0-9.]/g, '')) * parseFloat(formData.onHand || 0); const newItem = { id: Date.now(), ...formData, totalValue: calculatedTotalValue.toString() }; setStockItems([...stockItems, newItem]); // Reset form setFormData({ product: '', unitCost: '', unit: '', totalValue: '', onHand: '', freeToUse: '', incoming: '', outgoing: '' }); }; const handleBack = () => { navigate(-1); }; const handleMasterMenuNavigation = (path) => { setShowMasterMenu(false); navigate(path); }; return (
{/* Header */}
{/* Left side - Master Menu Button */}
When clicked on Stock Ledger, from master menu
By default land on List View
{/* Right side - Search and Controls */}
Allow user to search based on Product and Unit
{/* Master Menu Sidebar */} {showMasterMenu && ( <>
setShowMasterMenu(false)} />
Master Menu
)} {/* Main Content */}
{/* Stock Ledger Table */}
{/* Table Header */}

Stock Ledger

{/* Table */}
{filteredStockItems.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Product Unit Cost Unit Total Value On Hand Free to Use Incoming Outgoing
{item.product} {item.unitCost} {item.unit} {item.totalValue} {item.onHand} {item.freeToUse} {item.incoming} {item.outgoing}
{/* Form Section */}
{/* Form Header */}
{/* Form Content */}
{/* Left Column */}
setFormData({...formData, product: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" />
setFormData({...formData, unitCost: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" />
setFormData({...formData, unit: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" /> Selection field
setFormData({...formData, totalValue: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" /> Read-only : on Hand * unit cost
{/* Right Column */}
setFormData({...formData, onHand: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" />
setFormData({...formData, freeToUse: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" />
setFormData({...formData, outgoing: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" />
setFormData({...formData, incoming: e.target.value})} className="w-full bg-transparent border-b border-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 focus:outline-none focus:border-orange-400" />
); }; export default StockLedger;
